## Scraping Medicaid enrollment data from KFF dashboard {video-loop="true"}

Since Spring 2023, states have been disenrolling Medicaid beneficiaries who were previously eligible due to since-expired provisions passed during the pandemic.

We wanted to know, how does a state's disenrollment rate relate to policy options that states utilized to attempt a smooth transition?

To answer this, we required data.
